name: about-cli
description: About and Blog page generator for team and individual

scripts.cover: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test/**/*-spec.js -- -R spec && istanbul check-coverage
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test/**/*-spec.js --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: at15@outlook.com
